title: You can now buy a physical copy of Windows 11
content:
Windows 11 has been out for over half a year at this point, but if you’ve been wanting to buy a physical copy of the OS, now is the time to do it. Until now, the only way to get Windows 11 was to upgrade your Windows 10 PC or buy a new PC with

The post You can now buy a physical copy of Windows 11 appeared first on XDA.
description: If you've been wanting to buy a physical copy of Windows 11, you can now do that, as Microsot has started selling USB installation drives.
